title: Above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you, because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places.
Be curious, not judgmental.
Curiosity is more important than knowledge.
I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift would be curiosity.
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
Never dull your shine for somebody else.
You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
First, I prepare. Then I have faith.
We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant.
It’s better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret.
Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
Never, never, never give up.
If you have made mistakes, even serious ones, there is always another chance for you.  What we call failure is not the falling down, but the staying down.
Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it or work around it.
There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
Have patience with all things, but, first of all with yourself.
Patience is not simply the ability to wait—it's how we behave while we're waiting.
Patience is a form of wisdom. It demonstrates that we understand and accept the fact that sometimes things must unfold in their own time.
Patience and tenacity of purpose are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
Patience is more than simply learning to wait. It is having learned what is worth your time.
Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
Many people will walk in and out of your life but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.
The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education.
Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
